title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2804/1999 of 22 December 1999 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 2000 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2804/1999
of 22 December 1999
fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 2000 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 2000 fishing year, the carry-over aid for the products listed in Annex I(A), (D) and (E) to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92(3) shall be as indicated in the Annex thereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 2000.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
